issue.title: [C++][Gandiva] Support function aliases
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-5892](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-5892). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
This allows linking of several external names to the same precompiled function.
For example, 'mod', 'modulo' can be used to access the mod function

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-5892?focusedCommentId=16883738) by Pindikura Ravindra (pravindra):*
Issue resolved by pull request 4835
